nodes.text: Celebrating the Star Wars Celebration is an interview of Dan Madsen, who was the publisher of Star Wars Insider from 1987 through 2001; Jon Bradley Snyder, former editor of Star Wars Insider; Stephen J. Sansweet, head of Lucasfilm Ltd. fan relations; and Anthony Daniels, who portrayed C-3PO in all six movies.

The article covered how the first Celebration came to be, and how its success led to the other Celebrations being held. The interview was conducted by Scott Chernoff, appearing in Star Wars Insider 118.
